text: Hossein Amir-Abdollahian (; 23 April 1964 – 19 May 2024) was an Iranian politician and diplomat. He was foreign minister of Iran from 2021 until his death in 2024. He was the deputy foreign minister for Arab and African Affairs from 2011 to 2016. On 19 May 2024, a helicopter carrying Amir-Abdollahian and President Ebrahim Raisi crashed near the Azerbaijan–Iran border. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Aviation deaths Category:Iranian politicians Category:2024 Varzaqan helicopter crash
title: Hossein Amir-Abdollahian
